technologies.title: HTML
technologies.description: The standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

seo.meta_description: Learn HTML, the standard markup language for building web pages and structuring web content.
seo.og_description: Learn HTML, the standard markup language for building web pages.
seo.twitter_description: Learn HTML, the foundation of all web pages.

technologies.title: CSS
technologies.description: A stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML.

seo.meta_description: Learn CSS to style and layout web pages, including Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design.
seo.og_description: Learn CSS to style and layout web pages.
seo.twitter_description: Learn CSS for styling and layouting web pages.

technologies.title: JavaScript
technologies.description: A lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language for web development.

seo.meta_title: JavaScript – The Language of the Web
seo.meta_description: Learn JavaScript, the programming language that powers interactive and dynamic web applications.
seo.og_title: JavaScript – The Language of the Web
seo.og_description: Learn JavaScript for building dynamic web applications.
seo.twitter_title: JavaScript – The Language of the Web
seo.twitter_description: Learn JavaScript for dynamic and interactive web experiences.

technologies.title: Git
technologies.description: A distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code.

seo.meta_description: Learn Git, the industry-standard version control system for tracking code changes and collaboration.
seo.og_description: Learn Git for source code management and collaboration.
seo.twitter_description: Learn Git for version control and team collaboration.

technologies.title: GitHub
technologies.description: A cloud-based platform for hosting Git repositories and collaborating on code.

seo.meta_description: Learn GitHub for hosting repositories, managing pull requests, and automating workflows with GitHub Actions.
seo.og_description: Learn GitHub for hosting and collaborating on code.
seo.twitter_description: Learn GitHub for hosting and collaborating on projects.

technologies.title: npm
technologies.description: The default package manager for Node.js and the world's largest software registry.

seo.meta_description: Learn npm, the default package manager for Node.js used to manage JavaScript dependencies.
seo.og_description: Learn npm for managing JavaScript project dependencies.
seo.twitter_description: Learn npm for managing JavaScript dependencies.

technologies.title: pnpm
technologies.description: A fast, disk-efficient package manager for JavaScript projects.

seo.meta_description: Learn pnpm, a fast and disk-efficient alternative to npm for managing JavaScript dependencies.
seo.og_description: Learn pnpm for fast and efficient dependency management.
seo.twitter_description: Learn pnpm for efficient JavaScript dependency management.

technologies.title: Yarn
technologies.description: A reliable and fast JavaScript package manager with workspaces support.

seo.meta_description: Learn Yarn, a reliable JavaScript package manager with workspaces and zero-installs support.
seo.og_description: Learn Yarn for managing JavaScript project dependencies.
seo.twitter_description: Learn Yarn for reliable JavaScript dependency management.

technologies.title: Vite
technologies.description: A next-generation frontend build tool that offers extremely fast development server and optimized builds.

seo.meta_description: Learn Vite, the blazing fast frontend build tool with instant HMR and optimized production builds.
seo.og_title: Vite – Next Generation Frontend Build Tool
seo.og_description: Learn Vite for blazing fast frontend development.
seo.twitter_description: Learn Vite for fast frontend development and builds.

seo.twitter_description: Learn esbuild for extremely fast JavaScript builds.

technologies.title: SWC
technologies.description: A super-fast TypeScript/JavaScript compiler written in Rust used by Next.js and other tools.

technologies.title: Tailwind CSS

technologies.title: CSS Modules
technologies.description: A CSS file in which all class names are scoped locally by default, preventing style conflicts.

seo.meta_description: Learn CSS Modules for locally scoped CSS in component-based applications.

seo.twitter_description: Learn Styled Components for styling React components.

technologies.title: React
